focus.reason: It is the only active project, currently at 0%, and requires foundational progress to establish project momentum.

suggested_project.title: Dreams Beneath the Waves
suggested_project.description: A collection exploring the intersection of dreams and the ocean, weaving surreal narratives and imagery inspired by recurring dream and ocean themes.
suggested_project.based_on: High frequency of 'ocean' and 'dreams' in recent creations.

decisions: Prioritize foundational work on 'Echoes of the Ocean and Time' to avoid stagnation.
Maintain current focus on project work to meet the desired 70/30 project-to-standalone ratio.
Identify 'dreams' as a strong secondary theme for a future collection project.
No completion push needed as no projects are near completion.
